CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Brand__c ), 'Petit Forestier', IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.LogoPetitForestier__c , 'Petit Forestier', 30, 50), 'Stricher Froid',IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.LogoStricherFroid__c , 'Stricher', 30, 50), 'Zefirent',IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.Zefirent_Logo__c , 'Zefirent', 30, 50), 'Mendon Truck Leasing',IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.Mendon_Logo__c , 'Mendon', 30, 50), 'Medfood', IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.LogoPetitForestier__c , 'Petit Forestier', 30, 50), 'NOLEGGIO', IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.SVNoleggio_Logo__c, 'SV Noleggio', 40, 60), 'Reways', IMAGE($Setup.CompanyPicture__c.Logo_Reways__c, 'Reways', 40, 60), '' )
CustomField.label: Logo Marque
